tasks.title: Set Up Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize the project repository and set up the basic structure for the MCP Dust Server implementation.
subtasks: Clone the mcp-dust-server repository from https://github.com/ma3u/mcp-dust-server
Set up the project structure with necessary directories
Create a .gitignore file for the project
Create a README.md with project overview

tasks.title: Configure Environment and Dependencies
tasks.description: Set up the environment variables and install all necessary dependencies for the MCP Dust Server.
subtasks: Create a .env.example file with required environment variables
Set up configuration loading from environment variables
Install and configure Express.js for the HTTP server
Install and configure TypeScript and related tools

tasks.title: Implement Core MCP Server Structure
tasks.description: Implement the core structure of the MCP server based on the mcp-dust-server repository.
subtasks: Create the main server.js file with Express setup
Implement the MCPServer class with basic functionality
Set up SSE and HTTP Stream endpoints
Set up server startup and shutdown procedures

tasks.title: Implement DustService Class
tasks.description: Implement the DustService class that will interact with the Dust API.
subtasks: Set up methods for interacting with workspaces
Create utility functions for API requests
Implement error handling for API interactions

tasks.title: Implement Authentication System
tasks.description: Implement the authentication system for the MCP server, integrating with Dust's authentication.
subtasks: Implement API key validation for Dust API
Create session management for MCP clients
Set up permission checking for operations
Implement secure token storage and transmission

tasks.title: Implement API Reflection Layer
tasks.description: Implement the API Reflection Layer that maps Dust's API structure to MCP resources and tools.
subtasks: Implement methods for analyzing Dust's API structure
Create mapping functions for resources and tools
Set up response formatting and error handling
Create utility functions for API reflection

tasks.title: Implement Permission Proxy
tasks.description: Implement the Permission Proxy that provides a unified interface for checking permissions.
subtasks: Implement methods for checking resource permissions
Create functions for tool permission validation
Set up logging for permission checks
Create utility functions for permission management

tasks.title: Implement Event Bridge
tasks.description: Implement the Event Bridge that connects Dust's event system with MCP's progress notifications.
subtasks: Implement methods for subscribing to Dust events
Create functions for mapping events to MCP notifications
Implement progress reporting for long-running operations
Set up error handling for event processing
Create utility functions for event management

tasks.title: Implement Resource Hierarchy
tasks.description: Implement the Resource Hierarchy that mirrors Dust's data model in MCP resources.

tasks.title: Implement Workspace Integration
tasks.description: Implement the integration with Dust workspaces, exposing them as MCP resources.
subtasks: Extend DustService with workspace listing functionality
Create workspace creation and update functionality
Implement permission checking for workspace operations

tasks.title: Implement Agent Integration
tasks.description: Implement the integration with Dust agents, exposing them as MCP tools.
subtasks: Extend DustService with agent listing functionality
Create agent configuration and customization functionality
Implement permission checking for agent operations

tasks.title: Implement Knowledge Base Integration
tasks.description: Implement the integration with Dust knowledge bases, exposing them as MCP resources.
subtasks: Extend DustService with knowledge base listing functionality
Implement permission checking for knowledge base operations

tasks.title: Implement Connector Integration
tasks.description: Implement the integration with Dust connectors, exposing them as MCP resources and tools.
subtasks: Extend DustService with connector listing functionality
Implement permission checking for connector operations

tasks.title: Implement Error Handling and Logging
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive error handling and logging for the MCP Dust Server.
subtasks: Create a centralized error handling system
Implement detailed error messages and codes
Create structured logging for all operations
Implement log levels for different environments

tasks.title: Implement Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Implement performance optimization for the MCP Dust Server.
subtasks: Implement caching for frequently accessed resources
Create connection pooling for API requests
Create pagination for large data sets
Implement asynchronous processing for long-running operations

tasks.title: Create Comprehensive Documentation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation for the MCP Dust Server.
subtasks: Create API documentation for all endpoints
Create usage examples for common operations

tasks.title: Implement Testing Infrastructure
tasks.description: Implement testing infrastructure for the MCP Dust Server.

tasks.title: Write Unit Tests
tasks.description: Write unit tests for all components of the MCP Dust Server.
subtasks: Write tests for the MCPServer class
Create tests for the DustService class
Implement tests for the API Reflection Layer
Write tests for the Permission Proxy
Create tests for the Event Bridge
Implement tests for resource and tool handlers

tasks.title: Write Integration Tests
tasks.description: Write integration tests for the MCP Dust Server.
subtasks: Write tests for the authentication flow
Write tests for knowledge base access

tasks.description: Perform a security audit of the MCP Dust Server.

tasks.description: Create deployment infrastructure for the MCP Dust Server.

tasks.description: Prepare the MCP Dust Server for production deployment.
